column3: ## Admin - Add, Edit, Resolve
Navigate to /testdrive/flags
Login as an admin
Open Feline Aerodynamics Review application (available on your dashboard)

column4: Above the notes there is the Add Flag button visible and active

column3: Click Add Flag button

column4: An empty flag form is displayed

column3: In assigned_to input attempt to add editor's id (you can find it in your testdrive/flags data)

column4: No matches found is displayed and it is not possible to assign the editor

column3: In assigned_to input add random_user's id (you can find it in your testdrive/flags data)

column4: Id is found and it can be selected

column3: Select the random_user's id
In deadline input add an improbable date (e.g., 2025-02-31)

column4: The error Please enter a valid date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

column3: In deadline input add a valid date
In text area add flag's note (any text)
Save application

column4: The flag is saved and additional data (Created by user at date) are displayed
All fields are editable
Add Flag button is disabled

column3: Close the application with Unlock & Close
Open The Bermuda Triangle Journal of Lost and Found record (available on your dashboard)

column4: The record has a flag assigned to another user, with no deadline and with a note.
All flag fields are editable
Add Flag button is disabled

column3: Add a valid deadline to a flag (e.g., 2025-04-01)
Save the record

column4: The flag is correctly saved with a new deadline

column3: Click Resolve Flag button

column4: The flag is marked as resolved
Add Flag button is active
Undo Resolving button is active

column3: Click Undo Resolving

column4: The flag is displayed in normal mode

column3: Click Resolve Flag
Click Add Flag

column4: A new empty flag form is displayed above the resolved flag
Add Flag button is disabled
Resolve Flag under the previous flag is disabled

column3: Click Cancel to cancel adding a flag

column4: The empty form is hidden
Undo Resolving and Add Flag buttons are active

column3: Click Add Flag button
Add a new flag by assigning an admin and providing a note, then saving the application

column4: The new flag is saved and displayed
The old flag was converted to a note with text This flag was resolved on date by ; and flag's note

column3: Click Unlock & Close to close the application
Open Journal of Intergalactic Diplomacy record

column4: This record has a flag assigned to you
In the flag form, in the Assign a User input, there is your id with a red flag icon
Resolve Flag button is active and all fields are editable
